author: markekraus
body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/1c921cdf85e83c431a4888813302b0c241e384ce/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility/commands/utility/WebCmdlet/PSUserAgent.cs#L116

This should be  just `PowerShell` and not `WindowsPowerShell`.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
$bingdings = [System.Reflection.BindingFlags]::NonPublic -bxor [System.Reflection.BindingFlags]::Static
[Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.PSUserAgent].GetProperty('App',$bingdings).GetValue($null,$null)
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
PowerShell/6.0.0
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
WindowsPowerShell/6.0.0
```

Environment data
----------------


```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
```
```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.7
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.15063
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
and
```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.7
OS                             Linux 4.4.0-96-generic #119-Ubuntu SMP Tue Se...
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

```

## Note on changing this
There are several tests, like the one below, which will also need to be updated.

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/1c921cdf85e83c431a4888813302b0c241e384ce/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/WebCmdlets.Tests.ps1#L466

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I think it should be just "PowerShell/6.0.0"

title: Default User Agent Reports WindowsPowerShell
